actions.name: Recall (Fainted)
actions.description:
Trigger: The target is @Affliction[fainted].

Effect: Using the method of their choosing, the user takes a creature from their Team out of combat.
Most commonly, this is used with recalling creatures normally stored in Balls, who may recalled so long as the target is within line-of-sight of the user (and the Ball's recall emitter).

system.description:
Trigger: The target is @Affliction[fainted].

Effect: Using the method of their choosing, the user takes a creature from their Team out of combat as a Free Action. Normally, this may be used on a non-@Affliction[fainted]target as a Simple Action.
Most commonly, this is used with recalling creatures normally stored in Balls, who may recalled so long as the target is within line-of-sight of the user (and the Ball's recall emitter).
